Fasting therapy
Fasting is an important medium in the natural methods of health preservation. 
For fasting, mental preparedness is an essential precondition. Thereafter, fasting 
for one or two days is good for any individual. Prolonged fasting should be done only under the supervision of a competent naturopath.
Basically, fasting in naturopathy intends to give rest to the digestive system.
